name: Genesis (itch) (Syed Aman)
description:
Discord Invite Link (Provide Feedback & Playtest)
Twitch Channel

New Unit: Mechanic
Mechanics can repair tanks, and they cause the lightning effect.

Summary
An already playable strategy game for you & your friends to play. Made for different personalities: trigger happy, builder/fort-maker, support, explorer/adventurer/spy, & economy/macro. It implements ideas you & the community come up with. For casual & competitive players. When fleeing from the onslaught of technologically superior alien races, humans discover a mysterious planet the aliens call "Genesis." Command & build your army of heroic warriors to the death or survival of your race.

Play 5v5 with friends in casual or competitive multiplayer

Favorite unit: Snipers (and their lasers)

Snipers will have a hard counter to prevent spamming in next release!

Command Your Giant Armies
